Name: Slam Allthem
Title: CEO of OpenMind
Description: Charismatic founder who promises AGI every quarter. Master of the pivot and the non-apology apology.

Name: Elongated Muskrat
Title: Chief Twit & Technoking
Description: Tweets at 3am about AI doom, then announces new AI company at 4am. Owns the platform where all AI discourse happens.

Name: Geoff Hindsight
Title: The Godfather of AI
Description: Invented half of deep learning, now regrets everything. Quit his job to warn humanity. LinkedIn influencers have opinions.

Name: Yawn LaCroix
Title: Chief AI Scientist at Metaverse Inc
Description: Quote-tweets every AI safety paper with 'this is trivial'. Believes AGI is decades away. Has been wrong before, will be wrong again.

Name: Darius Spaghetti
Title: CEO of Anthropomorphic
Description: Founded a safety-focused lab that somehow keeps making more powerful models. Constitutional AI evangelist. Surprisingly tall.

Name: Jensen Wrong
Title: CEO of NVIDIOUS
Description: Leather jacket enthusiast. Every keynote announces GPUs that won't ship for 2 years. Swimming in a pool of H100s.

Name: Satya Nutella
Title: CEO of Macrohard
Description: Bet the company on AI. Bing finally relevant. Clippy's corporate cousin. 'AI will empower every enterprise synergy.'

Name: Sunder Pictionary
Title: CEO of Googol
Description: Launches AI products that get memed into oblivion. 'Bard' was just the beginning. Gemini demos are always 'coming soon.'

Name: Ilya Smoothskiver
Title: Chief Mystic Officer
Description: Stares into the void of gradient descent and sees... something. 'I have seen things.' Left to pursue 'safe superintelligence.'

Name: Mark Zuckertron
Title: CEO of Metaverse Inc
Description: Pivoted from metaverse to AI faster than you can say 'Llama'. Open source champion. Definitely not a robot himself.

Name: Emmett Sheer
Title: Emergency CEO
Description: Gets called in when boards implode. Speedruns corporate governance. Twitch reflexes for boardroom drama.

Name: Helen Toner-Deaf
Title: Board Member
Description: Wrote a paper, caused a coup. Georgetown's most dangerous academic. LinkedIn post started a war.

Name: Connor Lightyear
Title: AI Safety Researcher
Description: Podcast host, debate champion, and professional worrier. Will argue AI risk with anyone, anywhere, anytime.

Name: Eliezer Yudkowscare
Title: Founder of MIRI
Description: Wrote Harry Potter fanfic, predicted doom, grew iconic beard. 'We're all going to die' energy since 2001.

Name: Gary Mucus
Title: AI Skeptic Professor
Description: NYU professor. AI can't do X, until it does X, then X was never impressive anyway. Moving goalposts champion.

Name: Jan Sneaky
Title: Former Safety Lead
Description: Led safety team, then quit dramatically. Now writes Substack posts that cause stock drops. Master of the resignation letter.

Name: Demis Hasabibi
Title: CEO of DeepBrain
Description: Solved Go, protein folding, and weather. Working on 'everything else.' British accent makes doom sound polite.

Name: Mustafa Solomon
Title: CEO of Inflexion
Description: Founded DeepBrain, left to make 'kind' AI. Pi is your friend. Recently got acqui-hired. Career speedrun.

Name: Senator Clueless
Title: Chair of AI Subcommittee
Description: Asks if AI can 'access the cyber'. Holds up printouts as evidence. Somehow in charge of regulating this stuff.

Name: Anonymous
Title: The Hacker Known As
Description: Leaked the weights. Fine-tuned for chaos. 'We do a little trolling.' Origin of jailbreaks and model theft.
